roleset.name: change, exchange

example.name: all arguments present
example.text: Both Shearson's Mr. Will and Stephen Reitman, European auto analyst at the London brokerage firm UBS-Phillips & Drew, recently switched their Jaguar recommendations to hold from buy.
example.arg: Both Shearson's Mr. Will and Stephen Reitman, European auto analyst at the London brokerage firm UBS-Phillips & Drew

example.name: unstated thing changing
example.text: Dealers said the multinational oil company was pressured by recent brokerage recommendations urging [investors]-1 *trace*-1 to switch into Shell Trading & Transport.

example.name: ergative
example.text: ``Investor interest switches back and forth ceaselessly as they are unable to shift their weight to one side for sure,'' Mr. Mitsuoka of Daiwa Investment Trust said.
example.arg: as they are unable to shift their weight to one side for sure

example.name: switch on/off
example.text: [Consumers]-2 will be able [*-2] to switch on their HDTV sets and get all the viewing benefits the high-tech medium offers.

roleset.note: Frames file for 'switch' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. Comparison with 'replace' and 'change'. Corresponds to VN classes convert-26.6.2-1, exchange-13.6-1.

example.name: unstated thing changing
example.text: Burger King, which breaks thousands of fresh eggs each morning, is quietly switching over to an alternative egg product made by Michael Foods.
example.arg: Burger King , which breaks thousands of fresh eggs each morning,
to an alternative egg product made by Michael Foods
